statements.select: SELECT b.`Name` as FillStaff,c.HospdepName, a.EveresId,a.EveresName,a.IsFlag,a.ExamineState,a.FeedbackState,a.HappenedDate,a.SendtoDate,a.HospDepId,a.OperatorID FROM aers_tbl_eventsresume AS a LEFT JOIN aers_tbl_staff as b ON a.OperatorID = b.ReguserId LEFT JOIN aers_tbl_hospdep as c on a.HospDepId = c.HospdepId WHERE (a.EveresId = #EveresId#) AND a.IsFlag ='0'
WHERE (HappenedDate = #HappenedDate# AND SpellNo='ZERO' AND HospDepId = #HospDepId# AND IsFlag ='0')

SELECT * FROM aers_tbl_eventsresume WHERE HospId = (SELECT HospId FROM aers_tbl_hospdep WHERE HospdepId = (SELECT DepId FROM aers_tbl_staff WHERE ReguserId=#ReguserId#)) AND IsFlag ='0' and ExamineState=#ExamineState# ORDER BY SendtoDate DESC
SELECT * FROM aers_tbl_eventsresume WHERE OperatorID=#ReguserId# AND IsFlag ='0' and ExamineState!=3 ORDER BY SendtoDate DESC
SELECT * FROM aers_tbl_eventsresume WHERE HospId =#HospId# AND IsFlag ='0' and ExamineState=#ExamineState# ORDER BY SendtoDate DESC
SELECT * FROM aers_tbl_eventsresume WHERE HospDepId = (SELECT DepId FROM aers_tbl_staff WHERE ReguserId=#ReguserId#) AND IsFlag ='0' and ExamineState=#ExamineState# ORDER BY SendtoDate DESC
SELECT * FROM aers_tbl_eventsresume WHERE HospDepId = (SELECT DepId FROM aers_tbl_staff WHERE ReguserId=#ReguserId# ) and EveresName!=151 and ExamineState!=3 ORDER BY SendtoDate DESC
SELECT * FROM aers_tbl_eventsresume WHERE OperatorID=#ReguserId# and ExamineState!=3 ORDER BY SendtoDate DESC
SELECT * FROM aers_tbl_eventsresume WHERE ExamineState=#ExamineState# AND IsFlag ='0' and HappenedDate>=#HappenedDate# ORDER BY SendtoDate DESC
SELECT * FROM aers_tbl_eventsresume WHERE ExamineState=#ExamineState# AND IsFlag ='0' and HappenedDate>=#HappenedDate# and HospId=#HospId# ORDER BY SendtoDate DESC
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO aers_tbl_eventsresume ( EveresId, EveresName, SpellNo, EveresLevel, FeedbackState, ExamineState, HappenedDate, SendtoDate, HospDepId, HospId, Remark, IsFlag, OperatorDate, OperatorID, FileName
) VALUES ( #EveresId#, #EveresName#, #SpellNo#, #EveresLevel#, #FeedbackState#, #ExamineState#, #HappenedDate#, #SendtoDate#, #HospDepId#, #HospId#, #Remark#, #IsFlag#, #OperatorDate#, #OperatorID#, #FileName# )
statements.update: UPDATE aers_tbl_eventsresume SET EveresId = #EveresId#, EveresName = #EveresName#, SpellNo = #SpellNo#, EveresLevel = #EveresLevel#, FeedbackState = #FeedbackState#, ExamineState = #ExamineState#, HappenedDate = #HappenedDate#, SendtoDate = #SendtoDate#, HospDepId = #HospDepId#, HospId = #HospId#, Remark = #Remark#, IsFlag = #IsFlag#, OperatorDate = #OperatorDate#, OperatorID = #OperatorID#, FileName=#FileName# WHERE (EveresId = #EveresId#)
UPDATE aers_tbl_eventsresume SET FeedbackState = #FeedbackState#, ExamineState = #ExamineState# WHERE (EveresId = #EveresId#)
